SEARCH
Package com.cinemate.social.forum

Class ForumController

java.lang.Object
com.cinemate.social.forum.ForumController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/forum") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000") public class ForumController extends Object
REST Controller for managing forum operations. Provides endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting forum posts and replies. Includes functionality for subscription management, search, and administrative operations.
Version:
1.0
Author:
CineMate Team

      public ForumController()

  • Method Details

    • createPost

      @PostMapping("/posts") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumPostDTO> createPost(@RequestBody ForumPost post)
      Handles the creation of a new forum post. The authenticated user is associated with the post as the creator. Responds with the created post along with the status.
      Parameters:
      post - The forum post data included in the body of the request.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing the created ForumPostDTO and an HTTP status code.

    • getAllPosts

      @GetMapping("/posts") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumPostDTO>> getAllPosts(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size, @RequestParam(required=false) String category, @RequestParam(required=false) String mediaType, @RequestParam(required=false) String sortBy)
      Retrieves a paginated list of forum posts, optionally filtered by category, media type, or sorted by criteria.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number to retrieve, defaults to 0 if not specified
      size - the number of posts per page, defaults to 10 if not specified
      category - optional parameter to filter posts by category
      mediaType - optional parameter to filter posts by media type ("movie", "series", "none")
      sortBy - optional parameter to sort posts, e.g., "popular" or "recent"
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a Page object with the requested forum post DTOs

    • getPostById

      @GetMapping("/posts/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumPostDTO> getPostById(@PathVariable String id)
      Retrieves a specific forum post by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the forum post to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the ForumPostDTO if found

    • getPinnedPosts

      @GetMapping("/posts/pinned") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ForumPostDTO>> getPinnedPosts()
      Retrieves a list of pinned forum posts.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of pinned forum post DTOs as the body of the response

    • searchPosts

      @GetMapping("/posts/search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumPostDTO>> searchPosts(@RequestParam String query, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Searches for forum posts based on the given query.
      Parameters:
      query - the search query string used to search posts
      page - the page number for pagination, defaults to 0 if not specified
      size - the number of posts per page for pagination, defaults to 10 if not specified
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a paginated result of forum post DTOs matching the query

    • getPostsByUser

      @GetMapping("/posts/user/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumPostDTO>> getPostsByUser(@PathVariable String userId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of forum posts created by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user whose posts are to be retrieved
      page - the page number of the results to be retrieved (default is 0)
      size - the number of posts per page (default is 10)
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a Page of ForumPostDTO objects authored by the specified user

    • getPostsByMovie

      @GetMapping("/posts/movie/{movieId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumPostDTO>> getPostsByMovie(@PathVariable String movieId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of forum posts related to a specific movie.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the unique identifier of the movie for which the forum posts are requested
      page - the page number to retrieve (default is 0)
      size - the number of items per page (default is 10)
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a paginated list of ForumPostDTO objects

    • getPostsBySeries

      @GetMapping("/posts/series/{seriesId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumPostDTO>> getPostsBySeries(@PathVariable String seriesId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of forum posts associated with a specific series.
      Parameters:
      seriesId - the identifier of the series to fetch posts for
      page - the page number to retrieve, defaults to 0 if not specified
      size - the number of posts per page to retrieve, defaults to 10 if not specified
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a Page of ForumPostDTO objects associated with the specified series

    • getPostsUserParticipatedIn

      @GetMapping("/posts/user/{userId}/participated") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumPostDTO>> getPostsUserParticipatedIn(@PathVariable String userId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of forum posts that a specific user has participated in.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose participated posts are being retrieved
      page - the page number to retrieve, defaults to 0 if not provided
      size - the number of posts per page, defaults to 10 if not provided
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a paginated list of forum post DTOs the user has participated in

    • updatePost

      @PutMapping("/posts/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumPost> updatePost(@PathVariable String id, @RequestBody ForumPost post)
      Updates an existing forum post by its identifier. The method ensures that only an authenticated user with the necessary permissions can update the post.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the forum post to be updated
      post - the updated post data to be applied
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the updated ForumPost if successful

    • deletePost

      @DeleteMapping("/posts/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deletePost(@PathVariable String id)
      Deletes a post with the specified ID if the authenticated user has the required permission.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the post to be deleted
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with no content if the deletion is successful

    • toggleLike

      @PostMapping("/posts/{id}/like") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumPost> toggleLike(@PathVariable String id)
      Toggles the like status of a forum post for the authenticated user. If the user already likes the post, the like is removed. Otherwise, the user likes the post.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the forum post to be liked or unliked
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated ForumPost object if successful

    • removeLike

      @DeleteMapping("/posts/{id}/like") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumPost> removeLike(@PathVariable String id)
      Removes the like from a forum post for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the forum post to be unliked
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated ForumPost object if successful

    • createReply

      @PostMapping("/posts/{postId}/replies") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumReply> createReply(@PathVariable String postId, @RequestBody ForumReply reply)
      Creates a new reply to a forum post.
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to which the reply belongs
      reply - the reply object containing the details of the user's response
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the created ForumReply object if successful

    • getRepliesForPost

      @GetMapping("/posts/{postId}/replies") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumReply>> getRepliesForPost(@PathVariable String postId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      retrieve replies for a specific forum post.
      Parameters:
      postId - the unique identifier of the forum post for which replies are being fetched
      page - the page index for pagination, default is 0
      size - the number of replies per page for pagination, default is 10
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a Page of ForumReply objects, which represents the paginated list of replies for the given post

    • getRepliesByUser

      @GetMapping("/replies/user/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ForumReply>> getRepliesByUser(@PathVariable String userId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of forum replies created by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose replies are to be fetched
      page - the page number of the paginated results (default is 0)
      size - the number of replies per page in the paginated results (default is 10)
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a page of ForumReply objects authored by the specified user

    • updateReply

      @PutMapping("/replies/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumReply> updateReply(@PathVariable String id, @RequestBody ForumReply reply)
      Updates an existing forum reply with the specified id. The reply is updated if the authenticated user has permission to modify it.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the reply to be updated
      reply - the ForumReply object containing the updated details
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the updated ForumReply object

    • deleteReply

      @DeleteMapping("/replies/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteReply(@PathVariable String id)
      Deletes a reply associated with the given ID, if the authenticated user is authorized to do so.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the reply to be deleted
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with no content if the deletion is successful, or a FORBIDDEN status if the user is not authorized

    • toggleReplyLike

      @PostMapping("/replies/{id}/like") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumReply> toggleReplyLike(@PathVariable String id)
      Toggles the like status for a forum reply by the currently authenticated user. If the user has already liked the reply, the like is removed. If the user has not liked the reply, a like is added.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier
      Returns:
      the forum reply

    • subscribeToPost

      @PostMapping("/posts/{postId}/subscribe") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumSubscription> subscribeToPost(@PathVariable String postId)
      Subscribes the authenticated user to a post using the provided post ID.
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to subscribe to
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the details of the subscription if successful

    • unsubscribeFromPost

      @DeleteMapping("/posts/{postId}/unsubscribe") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> unsubscribeFromPost(@PathVariable String postId)
      Handles the unsubscription of a user from a specific post. This method allows authenticated users to unsubscribe from receiving notifications or updates about a specified post.
      Parameters:
      postId - the unique identifier of the post that the user wants to unsubscribe from
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with a no-content status (204) if the unsubscription is successful

    • getSubscriptionStatus

      @GetMapping("/posts/{postId}/subscription-status") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumController.SubscriptionStatus> getSubscriptionStatus(@PathVariable String postId)
      Retrieves the subscription status for a specific post.
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post for which the subscription status is being retrieved
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a SubscriptionStatus object, which includes the subscription status of the user and the total number of subscribers for the post

    • getUserSubscriptions

      @GetMapping("/subscriptions") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ForumSubscription>> getUserSubscriptions()
      Fetches the list of forum subscriptions for the currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of ForumSubscription objects representing the user's subscriptions on success, or ResponseEntity with a BAD_REQUEST status if an error occurs.

    • getPostCountByCategory

      @GetMapping("/stats/category/{category}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Long> getPostCountByCategory(@PathVariable String category)
      Retrieves the count of posts for a specified category.
      Parameters:
      category - the name of the category whose post count is to be fetched
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the count of posts in the specified category

    • getUserStats

      @GetMapping("/stats/user/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumController.ForumUserStats> getUserStats(@PathVariable String userId)
      Retrieves statistics for a specific user including post and reply counts.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user whose statistics are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing ForumUserStats with the post count and reply count for the specified user

    • getCategories

      @GetMapping("/categories") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumCategory[]> getCategories()
      Retrieves all available forum categories.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing an array of ForumCategory enums.

    • pinPost

      @PostMapping("/admin/posts/{id}/pin") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumPost> pinPost(@PathVariable String id, @RequestParam boolean pinned)
      Pins or unpins a forum post based on the provided pinned status. This endpoint is intended for administrative use.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the forum post to be pinned or unpinned
      pinned - the desired pinned status; true to pin the post, false to unpin
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the updated ForumPost if the operation is successful

    • adminDeletePost

      @DeleteMapping("/admin/posts/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> adminDeletePost(@PathVariable String id)
      Admin endpoint to delete posts without authorization checks. Useful for cleaning up posts from deleted users.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the forum post to be deleted
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with no content if the deletion is successful
